summary: Addon for Skyrim Expanded Loot Tables by Goth79 that supplements the loot dropped by humanoids and undead in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wonder why the dovahkiin is the only person in Skyrim walking around with 300 carry weight of belongings? While everyone else in Skyrim has the clothes on their back, a weapon, and some coins. This will improve immersion by actually having loot to sell and to help save up for a player home. Doesn't it seem odd that the local blacksmith is willing to purchase ten set of blood stained fur armors? This Addon for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11018/?]Skyrim Expanded Loot Tables[/url] by Goth79 will supplement the loot dropped by humanoids in Skyrim.


Most enemy humanoids and undead, except spriggans/ghosts, will have a chance to drop unleveled loot. Anything from iron to daedric gear, potions, ingredients, soul gems, jewelry, gems, books, scrolls, etc., all at level 1. Higher level gear is much more rare. For added immersion, this addon also removes non-animal parts from the animal loot table. It doesn't make any sense for animals to drop coins, gems, and jewelry.


There are no scripts in this mod. It is a very lightweight alternative to the other great loot mods in the recommended mods section. It only alters the leveled death items list in vanilla Skyrim.


[size=2][u]Requirement:[/u] [/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11018/?]Skyrim Expanded Loot Tables[/url] by Goth79

[size=2][u]Installation:[/u][/size]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Skyrim Expanded Death Loot Tables.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Skyrim Expanded Death Loot Tables.esp after Skyrim Expanded Loot Tables.esp

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
....
Skyrim Expanded Loot Tables.esp
Skyrim Expanded Death Loot Tables.esp
....
More Interesting Loot for Skyrim.esp   (load after Loot Tables mods if you use More Interesting Loot)
....
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp   (if you use Wrye Bash)


[u]Recommended mods:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48869/?]More Interesting Loot for Skyrim[/url]: GenghisBob
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42662/?]Dynamic Loot[/url]: 3JIou
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60567/?]Jebbalon's Treasure[/url]: Jebbalon
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33994/?]Underwater Treasure[/url]: Jokerine


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11018/?]Skyrim Expanded Loot Tables[/url]: Goth79
author: spikyfishy
